subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Penguins battled back from deficits of 2-0 and 3-1 to take a 2-1 lead over the host Blue Jackets in their playoff series.
snippet: The Penguins battled back from deficits of 2-0 and 3-1 to take a 2-1 lead over the host Blue Jackets in their playoff series.
